MdPairPotential Class Reference
Pair Potentials

Detailed Description

An PairPotential for MD simulation.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void addForces ( ) [pure virtual]

Calculate non-bonded pair forces for all atoms in this System.

Adds non-bonded pair forces to the current values of the forces for all atoms in this system. Before calculating forces, the method checks if the pair list is current, and rebuilds it if necessary.

Implemented in MdPairPotentialImpl< Interaction >.

Referenced by MdSystem::calculateForces().

void buildPairList ( )

Build the internal PairList.

As part of building the PairList, this method also shifts all atom positions into the primary image of the periodic boundary. In an MD simulation, the positions are allowed to wander out of the primary image between calls to this function.

Definition at line 44 of file MdPairPotential.cpp.

References ArrayIterator< Data >::notEnd(), and PArrayIterator< Data >::notEnd().

Referenced by MdSimulation::analyzeDumps(), MdSimulation::analyzeTrajectory(), MdSystem::load(), MdSystem::readConfig(), NvtDpdVvIntegrator::setup(), NvtNhIntegrator::step(), NvtDpdVvIntegrator::step(), NveVvIntegrator::step(), and NphIntegrator::step().

bool isPairListCurrent ( )

Return true if PairList is current, false if obsolete.

A PairList is considered current iff it has been built previously, and no particle has moved by a distance greater than skin/2 since the PairList was last built.
